WizardChoiceController - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.GUIControllers
Class WizardChoiceController implements all the logic behind the Wizard Choice Menu FXML Scene It sets up buttons and images styling, handles mouse events, and passes built message with wizard ID back to the GUI instance This class implements UpdatableController interface which includes a few methods to implement the typical tabletop turn mechanics and the updatable interface
